snippet: Kentucky and Baylor both won national championships this week, but Brittney Griner and her team did it the way it should be done in college basketball, says William C. Rhoden.
abstract: Kentucky and Baylor both won national championships this week, but Brittney Griner and her team did it the way it should be done in college basketball, says William C. Rhoden.

headline.main: Video: Two Sides of Big-Time Basketball
